short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See crowd-sourced ratings, reviews, prices, and more on LastBottleWines.com's daily offers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LastBottle (lastbottlewines.com) is often a great source of hard-to-find wines and great deals. Still, it is best to do your research before making a purchase.  While browsing LastBottle, this extension allows you to see the prices and ratings submitted on Vivino by other consumers.  This is particularly useful during their marathon auctions, where top deals sell out in minutes, if not seconds!

v1.1: Extends support to pages linked from referrers, such as email campaigns.
v1.2: Replaces tab view with sticky pane to optimize for viewing speed during marathons.
